long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple user-friendly online translator. Double-clicking on any English word will open a popup window with the translation to Greek and definition in English. Also, if available, a sound recording of the chosen word.
(Warning : The extension does not work in https pages for the moment, because of security restrictions)
